alert.note: Alert for Brown; Kewaunee (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 2:10PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Brown, Kewaunee and southern Door Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 209 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bay Shore Park, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Luxemburg around 225 PM CDT. Algoma around 240 PM CDT. Kewaunee around 250 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Krok, Norman, Rostok, Slovan, Gregorville, Ellisville, Rankin, Euren, Dyckesville and Rosiere. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
